textos_fuente.text: Paradise Bar & Grill Home About Lunch & Dinner Menu Brunch Menu Reviews Catering Contact Paradise Bar & Grill Welcome to Paradise Bar and Grill, a culinary gem nestled in the heart of Moses Lake. At Paradise, we pride ourselves on offering a unique dining experience that combines the comfort of a neighborhood bar with the sophistication of a gourmet grill. View Menu Reservation OUR STORY Welcome To Paradise At Paradise Bar & Grill, our mission is to create a culinary haven where exceptional flavors, warm hospitality, and a passion for quality ingredients converge. We strive to delight our guests with a memorable dining experience that goes beyond satisfying their appetites. Our commitment to excellence extends to every aspect of our establishment, from the carefully curated menu featuring locally sourced, fresh ingredients to the inviting ambiance that fosters connection and celebration. With a dedication to innovation and culinary artistry, we aim to be a culinary destination where every meal is an adventure, and every visit leaves a lasting impression. At Paradise Bar & Grill, we believe in the power of food to bring people together, and we invite you to join us on a journey of culinary exploration and delight. ONLY THE BEST Fresh Ingredient, Tasty Meals At Paradise Bar and Grill, our commitment to quality begins with our ingredients. We believe that the best flavors come from the freshest and finest produce. Our kitchen sources locally grown vegetables, fruits, and herbs, ensuring that every dish we serve is bursting with natural flavors and nutrients. View Items Chicken Alfredo Our Chicken Alfredo is pure comfort — tender grilled chicken layered over al dente pasta, all smothered in a creamy, house-made Alfredo sauce that's rich, velvety, and irresistibly smooth. It's a classic done to perfection. Churros Indulge in our signature churro: a golden, crunchy delight, topped with luscious whipped cream, ripe strawberries, and a generous drizzle of sweet syrup. Salmon Dive into the rich, buttery flavors of our perfectly seared salmon. Each fillet is a masterpiece, with its crispy skin and flaky, tender flesh, lightly seasoned to enhance its natural, ocean-fresh taste. A heart-healthy delight that's as nutritious as it is delicious. Sea Trout Our sea trout is a true standout — tender, buttery, and perfectly flaky, with a delicate ocean sweetness that melts in your mouth. It's pan-seared to crisp perfection and served with seasonal accompaniments that elevate every bite. Salad Bar Explore a world of freshness at our Salad Bar! Featuring an array of crisp vegetables, exotic toppings, and delectable dressings, it's a paradise for those who love to customize their healthy, vibrant meals. Ribs Get ready for a finger-licking adventure with our slow-cooked ribs. These fall-off-the-bone tender ribs are glazed in a smoky, sweet barbecue sauce, creating an irresistible combination of flavors. Perfect for those who love their meat rich, juicy, and full of robust, smoky goodness. Chicken Salad Enjoy a burst of freshness with our chicken salad, blending tender, seasoned chicken with a medley of crisp greens and juicy, ripe veggies. Tossed in a light, savory dressing, it's the perfect balance of health and flavor in every bite. Chicken Tacos Experience the zest and zing of our chicken tacos. Juicy, spiced chicken is nestled in soft, warm tortillas, topped with fresh salsa, creamy guacamole, and a sprinkle of cheese. Each bite is a fiesta of textures and flavors, sure to tantalize your taste buds. Shrimp Our shrimp dish is a flavor-packed favorite — plump, juicy shrimp sautéed to perfection and tossed in a rich, aromatic sauce that brings just the right balance of spice and savor. Every bite bursts with coastal freshness and bold, satisfying flavor. View Full Menu TESTIMONIALS What People are Saying “A Great Find” "Super nice and friendly staff to create a very warm environment! Glad we were able to find this gem with a view of Moses Lake at a Best Western nonetheless. Our steaks were perfect and our server was even better." Stella H “Fabulous food & flawless service” "A very low key place. Food is amazing, great salad bar and outstanding wait service!!! Love this place" Gerald M “Another great experience” "I usually tread lightly in hotel restaurants, but I'm very happy I chose to eat here. I had the fish and chips. It was not your basic frozen boxed fish. It was perfectly breaded and tasted great. Price was very reasonable. Service was fast even though they were very busy." Kelley B “Great time” "This place is one of my favorite restaurants in town! My hiding hole and the service is great! The drinks are amazing to, ordered a huckleberry mojito and was delicious. Prime rib is great, too. Amber is my favorite person here." J D Leave Us A Review Hours of Operation MON – THUR 11:00am – 9:00pm FRI-SAT 10:30am – 10:00pm BRUNCH FRI & SAT 10:30am – 2:30pm SUN 4:00pm - 9:00pm Make a Reservation 3000 W Marina Dr, Moses Lake, WA 98837 750-756-9211 ext 2 Drop Us a Line Don’t be shy. Let us know if you have any questions!
